Literature.Title: Associating Biological Activity and Predicted Structure of Antimicrobial Peptides from Amphibians and Insects.
Literature.Author: Ebrahimikondori H, Babcock A, Louie N, Li C, Coombe L, Lin D, Warren RL, Yanai A, Kotkoff M, Helbing CC, Hof F, Hoang LMN, Birol I

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=>128µg/ml),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Enteritidis(MIC=>128µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 29213(MIC=>128µM)
